text: anatha (kantavanva vivaha karagena) ovunge karanavehi sadharana lesa katayutu kirimata nohæki yayi oba biya vuvahot anit kantavangen oba kæmættanva dedena dedena vasayen ho tundena tundena vasayen ho hataradena hataradena vasayen ho obata vivaha kara gata hækiya (ese kihipa deneku vivaha kara gatahot e avasthavedida ovun atare oba sadharana lesa katayutu kala yutuya. ese) oba sadharanava katayutu kirimata nohæki ve yayi biya vuvahot eka kantavakma nætahot obage palanaya yatate sitina (vahal) striyakma (vivaha kara) gata yutuya. oba bheda kara nogænimata meyama itamat pahasu (margayak) vanneya
